Data Access Layer (DAL)¶

DAL is the only way of accessing databases in the whole application. There are 2 main packages namely mysql and oracle for the 2 db resources we have. Each of them contains list of packages for each db scheme we have. These schema packages are simply direct implementation for Table Gate Way and Transaction Scripts design pattern.

MySQL¶

MySQL.common¶

This module contains basic DB connection and sql execution.

dal.mysql.common.execute_insert(sql_stmt, db)¶

Executes insert/update statement

Parameters:
  • sql_stmt (str) – SQL statement to be executed.
  • db (dict) – Json object containing connection string parameters
dal.mysql.common.execute_select(sql_stmt, db)¶

Executes select statement and returning list of results.

Parameters:
  • sql_stmt (str) – SQL statement to be executed.
  • db (dict) – Json object containing connection string parameters
Returns:

list of results from DB
dal.mysql.common.retrieve_connection(db)¶

Retrieves Database connection object for a given connection parameters.

Parameters:db (dict) – Json object containing connection parameters
Returns:MySQLDB.Connection object

Oracle¶

Oracle.common¶

This module contains basic DB connection and sql execution.

dal.oracle.common.execute_insert(sql_stmt, db)¶

Executes insert/update statement

Parameters:
  • sql_stmt (str) – SQL statement to be executed.
  • db (dict) – Json object containing connection string parameters
dal.oracle.common.execute_select(sql_stmt, db, keep_connection=False)¶

Executes select statement and returning list of results.

Parameters:
  • sql_stmt (str) – SQL statement to be executed.
  • db (dict) – Json object containing connection string parameters
  • keep_connection – Keep the connection opened so that can be used to retrieve other nested objects. e.g. the content of an xml object.
Returns:

list of results from DB
dal.oracle.common.retrieve_connection(db)¶

Retrieves Database connection object for a given connection parameters.

Parameters:db (dict) – Json object containing connection parameters
Returns:oracle.dbms.Connection object
